about_the_game:
Unlocks 5 Season 1 DLC characters in Granblue Fantasy: Versus.

Contents
■Playable Character "Beelzebub"
■Playable Character "Narmaya"
■Playable Character "Soriz"
■Playable Character "Djeeta"
■Playable Character "Zooey"
■Lobby Avatar "Nice-abs Vyrn"

Notice:
These contents are also available as a stand-alone purchase. Be careful not to purchase the contents twice.

In order to use this downloadable content, you will need the main product, which is sold separately. The latest content update may be required.

Some contents in this set can only be used after a certain game update. Check the official Granblue Fantasy: Versus website for the update details.

This set does not include digital purchase bonuses for the original smartphone/browser game Granblue Fantasy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
